00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.

00005 
00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 #include "init.h"
00009 #include "compiler.h"
00010 #include "strings.h"
00011 
00012 void processProgramArguments(MavenCompiler* c, int argc, char** argv) {
00013         c->option_base_path = string(argv[0]).substr(0, strlen(argv[0]) - 6);
00014         
00015         // if there is no arguments we need to explain to the user
00016         if(argc == 1)
00017                 usage();
00018         
00019         // read arguments
00020         for(int i = 1; i < argc; ++i) {
00021                 if(argv[i][0] == '-') {
00022                         string value = "";
00023                         string key = argv[i];
00024                         stripHyphen(key, value);
00025                         if(value == "<next>")
00026                                 value = argv[++i];
00027                         
00028                              if(key == "c") c->option_c = true;
00029                         else if(key == "e") c->option_e = true;
00030                         else if(key == "h") c->option_h = true;
00031                         else if(key == "i") c->option_i = value;
00032                         else if(key == "K") c->option_K = true;
00033                         else if(key == "n") c->option_n = value;
00034                         else if(key == "o") c->option_o = value;
00035                         else if(key == "r") c->option_r = true;
00036                         else if(key == "s") c->option_s = atoi(value.c_str());
00037                         else if(key == "v") c->option_v = true;
00038                         else if(key == "V") c->option_V = true;
00039                         else if(key == "w") c->option_w = value;
00040                         else if(key == "W") c->option_W = value;
00041                         else if(key == "x") c->option_x = true;
00042                         else if(key == "doc-sql") c->option_doc_sql = value;
00043                         else if(key == "doc-sqlite3") c->option_doc_sqlite3 = value;
00044                         else if(key == "doc-xml") c->option_doc_xml = value;
00045                         else if(key == "doc-html") c->option_doc_html = value;
00046                         else {
00047                                 cout << "Error: Unknown argument '" << key << "'" << endl;
00048                                 exit(1);
00049                         }
00050                 } else c->option_i = argv[i];
00051         }
00052         
00053         // set result name
00054         if(c->option_n == "") {
00055                 if(c->option_i.find_last_of('.') != string::npos)
00056                         c->option_n = c->option_i.substr(0, c->option_i.find_last_of('.'));
00057                 else c->option_n = c->option_i;
00058         }
00059         
00060         // check optimsation level
00061         if(c->option_o != "") {
00062                 if(c->option_o != "0" && c->option_o != "1" && c->option_o != "2" &&
00063                    c->option_o != "3" && c->option_o != "s") {
00064                         cerr << "Error: Invalid optimsation level '" << c->option_o << "'" << endl;
00065                         exit(1);
00066                 }
00067         }
00068         
00069         // check Object-safety level
00070         if(c->option_s != 0 && c->option_s != 1 && c->option_s != 2 && c->option_s != 3) {
00071                 cerr << "Error: Invalid Object-safe level '" << c->option_s << "'" << endl;
00072                 exit(1);
00073         }
00074         
00075         // print all variables
00076         if(c->option_V) {
00077                 cout << "--------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00078                 cout << "-c="  << boolOnOff(c->option_c) << endl;
00079                 cout << "-e="  << boolOnOff(c->option_e) << endl;
00080                 cout << "-h="  << boolOnOff(c->option_h) << endl;
00081                 cout << "-K="  << boolOnOff(c->option_K) << endl;
00082                 cout << "-i='" << c->option_i << "'" << endl;
00083                 cout << "-n='" << c->option_n << "'" << endl;
00084                 cout << "-o='" << c->option_o << "'" << endl;
00085                 cout << "-s='" << c->option_s << "'" << endl;
00086                 cout << "-v="  << boolOnOff(c->option_v) << endl;
00087                 cout << "-V="  << boolOnOff(c->option_V) << endl;
00088                 cout << "-w='" << c->option_w << "'" << endl;
00089                 cout << "-W='" << c->option_W << "'" << endl;
00090                 cout << "-x="  << boolOnOff(c->option_x) << endl;
00091                 cout << "--doc-sql='" << c->option_doc_sql << "'" << endl;
00092                 cout << "--doc-sqlite3='" << c->option_doc_sqlite3 << "'" << endl;
00093                 cout << "--doc-xml='" << c->option_doc_xml << "'" << endl;
00094                 cout << "--doc-html='" << c->option_doc_html << "'" << endl;
00095                 cout << "--------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00096         }
00097         
00098         // print version
00099         if(c->option_v) {
00100                 cout << "maven v1.0" << endl;
00101                 exit(0);
00102         }
00103         
00104         // there must be a file given
00105         if(c->option_i == "" && c->option_x == false)
00106                 die("No input files");
00107 }
